name: Math behind BFV scheme
description: I will go over a RLWE problem to construct a public key BFV scheme of FHE. This talk is going to be a TLDR of whiteboard math session of FHE workshop at 13:30 on Friday.

speakers.name: Yuriko
speakers.bio: We're doing a research on the intersection of FHE and ZK, how we can combine those two to build cool applications/components to help the ecosystem.
